channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Home Depot earnings sweep past expectations
Trump is the most pro-stock-market president the republic has had: Jeremy Siegel
Bayer shares slump after profit warning on agricultural markets
Ryanair CEO Michael O’Leary sparks debate after ‘crass’ comments calling for fewer ex-teachers in Irish politics
item.description: O'Leary told Ireland's tourism minister to go back to the classroom as he called for more business people in politics.

item.title: 23andMe to slash 40% of its workforce, end therapeutics program to cut costs
Trump’s first 2 immigration policy job picks have defended family separation and ramped-up deportations
item.description: Stephen Miller and Thomas Homan portray illegal immigration as a black-and-white issue and applaud Trump’s policy of targeting everyone living in the ...

item.title: Gen Z is avoiding university—but it could be the key to landing a hybrid job
item.description: Hybrid work is popular for many reasons. But if having a hybrid job is the goal, shunning university could hurt candidates' chances, ONS found.

item.title: After nearly hitting $90,000, bitcoin drops sharply
German government agrees to February snap election—just weeks after Trump’s inauguration—to restore political stability
item.description: Germany faces a brutal winter election campaign after its three-way coalition government collapsed.

item.title: Gen Z and millennial worker productivity is being crushed by bosses who don’t understand them, top economics university research says
item.description: Around a third of Gen Z and millennials report low productivity, and it's their bosses' faults.
